definition: diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

pinyin: tu2 xiang4 hu4 huan4 ge2 shi4
tu2 xiang4 yong4 hu4 jie4 mian4

sentences.english: Digital image steganography does have some drawbacks, though.
sentences.chinese: 但是，數碼圖像隱寫術仍然有一定缺點。

sentences.english: What we would really like to do is get the image descriptor from the image registry.
sentences.chinese: 我們真正想做的是從圖像註冊表獲取圖像描述符。

sentences.english: What we would really like to do is get the image descriptor from the image registry.
sentences.chinese: 我們真正想做的是從圖像註冊表獲取圖像描述符。

sentences.english: Consider that each resource pool has its own set of registered image templates.
sentences.chinese: 要考慮給每一個資源池指定自己的註冊圖像模板集。

sentences.english: This paper describes the basic principles of the image digitizer and its development course.
sentences.chinese: 本文論述了圖像數字化器的基本原理及其發展過程。

sentences.english: We do some research on binarization of gray image and character segmentation.
sentences.chinese: 研究了灰度文本圖像二值化及字符分割。

sentences.english: We are replacing the graph by its tangent plane.
sentences.chinese: 我們用函數的切平面來替代它的圖像。

sentences.english: Image distortion correction includes spatial correction and gray-level correction.
sentences.chinese: 圖像畸變校正包括空間位置校正和灰度校正。

sentences.english: Methods Two-dimensional ultrasound images scanning by free-hand were reconstructed stereoscopically in 39 patients with different diseases.
sentences.chinese: 方法採用本方法對39例患者進行了三維圖像重建。

sentences.english: Experiments with imago and larva locust images is segmented.
sentences.chinese: 實驗對成蟲與幼蟲圖像均進行分割。

sentences.english: Raster-based data formats tend to behave much more like images.
sentences.chinese: 基於柵格的數據格式更類似於圖像。

sentences.english: Unsurprisingly, the product image and the bright orange buttons.
sentences.chinese: 毫無疑問，是產品圖像和淺橙色的按鈕。

sentences.english: Vectorization is a crucial step in the automatic punching.
sentences.chinese: 矢量化是圖像自動編針中很重要的步驟。

sentences.english: Many libraries and archives now have historical digital image collections available.
sentences.chinese: 如今，許多圖書館圖書館提供歷史數字圖像資料。

sentences.english: A novel pixel-level image fusion scheme based on gradient pyramid decomposition is presented.
sentences.chinese: 給出了基於梯度塔形分解的像素級圖像融合新方法。
